package.name: ArtsOnIT_OfflineMaintenance
package.summary: Allow administrators to switch off any store view during mantenance operation.
package.description:
Allow administrators to switch off any store view during maintenance operations.
- Administrators are able use all Magento functions during maintenance operations - Message is customizable (Global or each store view) - Visual reminder of maintenance mode - SEO Build-in optimization: page status is set as 503 - Courtesy page is showed in every single front page
